text: To build the applications comprising the Barista suite, just run the `build` executable.

Barista benchmarks run in a single JVM process, which makes them convenient to use with profilers, instrumenters and other analysis tools. You can attach these tools using the `--cmd-app-prefix` option.
Barista has a comprehensive set of command-line options -- type `-h` to see them.
You can select different execution modes using the `--mode` option.

You can easily add your own applications to the Barista benchmark suite. Simply create a new subdirectory in the `benchmarks` directory containing the source code, provide a workload config file, and a `build.sh` script.
